turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, Sally, I'd like you to order a drink from Starbucks for me, but I'm not sure about the menu options.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! I can help you figure out what you'd like to drink. First, where am I picking up your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on 6th Street in City Center is the best for me, so that it's still hot when it gets here.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. What are some of your preferences when ordering coffee today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I usually take it black, but I think I'd like to mix it up. I'd prefer a steamed milk coffee drink, but would like to use an alternative milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! This Starbucks has coconut milk, soy milk, and almond milk. Which do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I would love almond milk!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good to me. Now, what kind of coffee would you like? Latte? Macchiato?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, I don't know. DO they have any seasonal drinks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely, they do! Right now, they have a Caramel Creme Brulee, a Black and White Mocha, a Chestnut Praline Latte, an Eggnog Latte, a Gingerbread Latte, and an Iced Peppermint Mocha,

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do all of them come hot or iced?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, you can order any of them hot or iced.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wonderful. I'd like to try to the Creme Brulee one. What does it have in it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like it's made with espresso, then has steamed milk, caramel brulee sauce, and whipped cream with a brulee topping, whatever that is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds delicious! Can I order one hot and one cold?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely! What sizes do you want? The sizes are short, tall, grande, and venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make the hot one Grande and the cold one tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, and do you want this order placed right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please, thank you, Sally.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Your order has been placed and I'll email you a receipt if you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That won't be necessary. Please tip the barista two dollars per drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, Sally, talk soon!
